title: How to Get Robux for Your Roblox Account

steps.title: Open the Roblox website.
steps.content: Open the Roblox website. Go to https://www.roblox.com/home in your browser. If you're logged into Roblox, doing so will open the Home page. If you aren't logged into Roblox, click Log In in the upper-right corner. Then enter the username and password associated with your Roblox account and click Log In. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click the Robux tab.
steps.content: Click the Robux tab. It's at the top of the Roblox page, to the left of the search bar.

steps.title: Click a Robux package deal.
steps.content: Click a Robux package deal. Click the number of Robux you want to buy. Prices range from $4.99 for 400 Robux, up to $199.99 for 22,500 Robux. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select a payment method.
steps.content: Select a payment method. Click one of the options on the right to select a payment method. The options are as follows: Credit Card — Click this option to pay with a credit card. Debit Card — Click this option to pay with a debit card. PayPal — Click this option to pay with a PayPal account . Redeem Roblox Card — Select this option if you have a Roblox gift card purchased from a retail store. Other — This option displays other payment options, including Amazon Pay, SafePay Card, CVS Pharmacy, or Ethereum

steps.title: Enter your payment details.
steps.content: Enter your payment details. Use one of the following options to enter your payment information: Credit or Debit card — If you are using a credit or debit card, you will need to enter an email address. Then enter the card number, expiration date, CVV/CVC number on the back, the name on the card, and the zip code. PayPal — If you selected PayPal, sign in with the email address and password associated with your PayPal account. Redeem Roblox Card — If you have purchased a Roblox card, scratch the back to reveal the 10 or 12 PIN on the back. Enter the PIN and click Redeem .

steps.title: Click Pay or Submit Order.
steps.content: Click Pay or Submit Order . It's the green button below your payment info. Once the payment is processed, Robux will be added to your account.

steps.title: Open the Roblox website.
steps.content: Open the Roblox website. Go to https://www.roblox.com/home in your browser. If you're logged into Roblox, doing so will open the Home page. Subscribing to a premium account will allow you to receive Robux each month as well as unlock the ability to trade items with other players. If you aren't logged into Roblox, click Log In in the upper-right corner. Then enter the username and password associated with your Roblox account and click Log In. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Click Get Premium.
steps.content: Click Get Premium . It's at the bottom of the menu bar on the left. This displays options for how to upgrade to a premium account.

steps.title: Scroll down and click Subscribe Now below one of the subscription tiers.
steps.content: Scroll down and click Subscribe Now below one of the subscription tiers. Depending on how many monthly Robux you want to receive, click Subscribe now below one of the following options: [5] X Research source 450 — Receive 450 Robux per month for $4.99 per month. 1000 — Receive 1000 Robux per month for $9.99 per month. 2250 — Receive 2250 Robux per month for $19.99 per month.

steps.title: Select a payment method.
steps.content: Select a payment method. On the right side of the page, click whichever option you want to use to pay for your subscription. The options are as follows: Credit Card — Click this option to pay with a credit card. Debit Card — Click this option to pay with a debit card. PayPal — Click this option to pay with a PayPal account. Redeem Roblox Card — Select this option if you have a Roblox gift card purchased from a retail store.

steps.title: Enter your payment details.
steps.content: Enter your payment details. Use one of the following options to enter your payment details: Credit or debit card — To pay with a credit or debit card, enter the card number, expiration date, zip code, and CVV/CVC code on the back of the card. Then click the checkbox to authorize monthly charges to your credit or debit card. PayPal — To pay with a PayPal account, sign in with the email address and password associated with your PayPal account. And then authorize the payment. Redeem Roblox Card — To redeem a Roblox gift card, scratch off the back to reveal the 10 or 12 digit PIN number. Enter the PIN number and click Redeem .

steps.title: Click Submit Order.
steps.content: Click Submit Order . It's the green button at the bottom of the page. Doing so will purchase your selected Premium package, which will add the appropriate number of Robux to your monthly balance.

steps.title: Make sure that you're a Premium member.
steps.content: Make sure that you're a Premium member. Anybody can make a T-shirt , shirt or pants in Roblox. But if you want to sell them for money, you need to have a premium membership . [6] X Research source It costs 10 Robux to make a shirt or pants for Roblox. However, you can make a T-shirt for free. Shirts and pants use a graphic that wraps around the body of the avatar allowing for more detail on all sides. A T-shirt is just a decal or graphic that goes on the chest of the avatar.

steps.title: Open the Roblox website.
steps.content: Open the Roblox website. Go to https://www.roblox.com/home in your browser. If you're logged into Roblox, doing so will open the Home page. If you aren't logged into Roblox, enter your username and password in the upper-left side of the page, then click Sign In .

steps.title: Click the Create tab.
steps.content: Click the Create tab. It's at the top of the page and should bring you to "My creations."

steps.title: Click My Creations.
steps.content: Click My Creations . If you're not on the "My Creations" page, click the My Creations tab. It's the first tab at the top of the page.

steps.title: Select an item category.
steps.content: Select an item category. Click an item type (e.g., T-shirts , Shirts , Pants , etc.) below the "My Creations" heading on the left.

steps.title: Create your clothing image file.
steps.content: Create your clothing image file. To do so, first, you need to download the image template. There is a download link at the top of the page that says "Did you use the template? If not, download it here." The template shows exactly where to place the images for the front, back, top, bottom, and sides of your clothing . You can use an image editor, such as Photoshop , or GIMP to create the images for your clothing. Make sure you place your clothing artwork on a separate layer from the template. Once you are done, hide the layer with the template and save your clothing as a PNG file. T-shirts don't have a template. T-shirts act more like a decal or logo that goes on the front of the avatar's torso. Whereas, regular "Shirts" have a template that wraps around the entire torso. You may want to test your shirt or pants in Roblox Studio before paying to upload it to Roblox to make sure everything looks right.

steps.title: Upload the image file.
steps.content: Upload the image file. To do so, click Upload file at the top of the page. [7] X Research source Select the image file for your clothing and then enter a name for your clothing next to "Shirt Name," "Pants Name," or "T-Shirt Name." Then click Upload for 10 Robux or Upload to upload your clothing.

steps.title: Click the gear icon next to the T-shirt, shirt, or pants you want to sell.
steps.content: Click the gear icon next to the T-shirt, shirt, or pants you want to sell. It's to the right of each clothing item you have uploaded. This displays a drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Configure.
steps.content: Click Configure . It's usually the first option at the top of the drop-down menu that appears when you click the Gear icon. This opens up the configuration menu.

steps.title: Click Sales.
steps.content: Click Sales . It's in the menu box on the left side of the configuration menu. This opens the Sales menu.

steps.title: Click the toggle switch next to "Item for Sale."
steps.content: Click the toggle switch next to "Item for Sale." It's on the right side across from "Item for Sale" at the top of the page. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Enter how much you want to sell the item for.
steps.content: Enter how much you want to sell the item for. Enter how many Robux you want to sell the item for next to "Price." Items cannot be sold for free. The minimum you can sell a T-shirt for is 2 Robux, and the minimum you can sell a shirt or pants for is 5 Robux.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . It's below the menu on the right-hand side. This saves the configuration and lists your item for sale. [9] X Research source Robux earned by selling clothing or other avatar items will be held in an escrow account for 30 days. Once the 30 days is up, it will be released for you to use. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Download and install Roblox Studio.
steps.content: Download and install Roblox Studio. Another way to earn Robux is to create games for Roblox. Roblox studio is the main program used to create Roblox games. You can download Roblox Studio for free. To do so, go to https://create.roblox.com/ . in a web browser. Then click Start Creating . Open the installation file in your Downloads folder and follow the instructions to complete the installation.

steps.title: Make a pay-to-play game.
steps.content: Make a pay-to-play game. Most games in Roblox are free-to-play. However, you can charge Robux for access to the games that you have made . Roblox will take a percentage of your earnings. The amount they take varies but will be stated in Roblox Studio below the bar where you enter the amount you want to charge. If you are going to charge access for a game, you should also make a video trailer to let people know what they will be getting when they pay for your game. Use the following steps to charge access to one of your games: [11] X Research source Open Roblox Studio . Click My Games in the panel to the left. Click the game you want to charge access for. Click Game Settings in the panel at the top. Click Monetization in the menu to the left. Click the toggle switch next to "Paid Access." Enter the amount of Robux you want to charge. Click Save .

steps.title: Make purchasable items for your game.
steps.content: Make purchasable items for your game. If you want to keep your game free-to-play, you can still earn Robux by making purchasable items for your game. These can include power-ups or consumable items that replenish the player's health, ammo, etc. You can create a shop that players can use to purchase these items, or you can just add a menu to the HUD that players can use to purchase items.

steps.title: Become a creator of user-generated content (UGC items).
steps.content: Become a creator of user-generated content (UGC items). UGC items are accessories for avatars that are created by users and sold in the Avatar Shop. To do this, you need to have some 3D modeling skills with a program like Blender 3D. Then you need to get accepted to the UGC Program when they are accepting new applicants. They open the UGC Program to new applicants in waves. Once you are accepted, you can submit your own UGC items to Roblox. They will review each item before uploading them to the store. They will also take a cut of all sales. The following are some tips to help you get accepted to the program: [12] X Research source [13] X Research source Start creating items in Roblox Studio. You don't need to be a member of the program to make accessories for your avatar and test them in Roblox Studio. Start practicing. Start making unique items. Tweet out your creations. Make a Twitter account dedicated to sharing your creation. Tweet videos and photos of your creations with the hashtags "#RobloxUGC" and "#RobloxDev." Get involved in the community. Make friends with people who are members of the UGC Program. Reach out to Roblox YouTubers who are members of the Star Program. They're allowed to upload UGC items, but few know how to make them. If you get involved in the community, you may be able to get some of your items uploaded to Roblox without being a member. Fill out the application when they are accepting new applicants. Pay attention to when they are accepting new applicants. Put a portfolio together and get your application in as soon as possible. Keep trying. If you don't get accepted the first time, keep trying. Keep making new items, and eventually, you'll get in.

steps.title: Sell Limited and Limited Unique items.
steps.content: Sell Limited and Limited Unique items. Limited items are items that used to be regular items sold in the Avatar Store that are no longer for sale. Limited Unique items are items that are sold for a limited quantity and then become available for resale and trade once they are sold out. If you have any limited or limited unique items, you may be able to trade them with other players in order to earn Robux. You need to have a premium membership in order to do so. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Make a game pass.
steps.content: Make a game pass. Another way to earn Robux is to create a game pass for your game. A game pass allows users to pay a one-time fee for special privileges. These privileges can be anything you want. It can allow players to fly, give players double experience, double gold, etc. Make sure you don't give away too many unfair advantages in your game pass. Otherwise, it could make it unfair for other players who are trying to compete.

steps.title: Market your skills as a developer.
steps.content: Market your skills as a developer. Creating a Roblox game takes a lot of time and effort and requires a lot of skills. Most people don't develop games on their own. One way to earn some Robux is to market your skills as a developer and help other people make games. You'll need to pick a trade and create a portfolio . Then you can market yourself on social media, web forums, Discord, or in other Roblox games. The following are some trades you can develop and market: Scripting — Scripting is one of the most important jobs when developing a game. It's also one of the highest-paying jobs. If you are talented at scripting, you may be able to earn some Robux by scripting for Robux games. Building — Another thing you can do to earn Robux is to develop your building skills and make things for Roblox games . This could be anything, including buildings, weapons, or vehicles. While you can build things inside Roblox Studio, many builders are utilizing external 3D modeling software, such as Blender 3D to create things. So if you have skills as a 3D modeler, you may be able to earn some Robux building objects and worlds for games. Graphic Design — Graphic designers create image graphics. They use graphic design programs like Photoshop and Illustrator to create icons, and game thumbnail images. Sometimes they create the HUD or user interface for a game. Animation — Animators use their skills to create animations for objects, non-player characters, and avatars. This is a little different skill from 3D modeling. If you have experience animating, you may be able to make some Robux creating animations for games.
